title: Puck Pieterse, Fenix-Deceuninck break new ground with huge deal stretching through 2027
content:
Multi-discipline dazzler signs longest-known contract in women's cycling as investment in the sport continues to snowball.

Read the full article at Puck Pieterse, Fenix-Deceuninck break new ground with huge deal stretching through 2027 on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
